2.name: Foresight
2.description: Active objectives that are within 15 metres of you are waypointed, even if you didn’t help activate them

3.name: Bright Eyed
3.description: See slightly better in the dark without using light sources

5.name: Backstabber
5.description: Deal 10% more damage from behind targets

6.name: Unsung Hero
6.description: You will be notified who took an objective that you’ve activated

7.name: Frisk
7.description: You can see downed people’s items in their nametag

8.name: Interrogate
8.description: If you're involved in a vote that passed there is a chance that you will be told if they were Infected. Only one person can be informed per passing vote.

10.name: Second Chance
10.description: When antidoting someone, nearby Terrors will become downed

11.name: Panic!
11.description: 15% increased movement speed when in gas and when the exit is open

13.name: Blood Thirsty
13.description: In Terror form move 10% faster when moving towards Innocents that are carrying fuses

14.name: Stealth
14.description: Transform in and out of Terror form quieter

17.name: Slasher
17.description: Increased melee damage with the knife

18.name: Evasion
18.description: Trackers last 50% less time on you

19.name: Scavenger
19.description: You are more likely to find more ammo when picking it up

24.name: Bullet Time
24.description: Take 25% less damage in Terror form

25.name: Tread Lightly
25.description: Terrors see your position for less time when they detect your movement

26.name: Surveillance
26.description: If you revive someone you can see their position for 15 seconds

27.name: Stubborn
27.description: Levers that you’ve activated require more damage to disable

29.name: Sixth Sense
29.description: At night all accessible blood bags are highlighted to you

30.name: Every Last Drop
30.description: If you respawn in human form you will lose only 1/2 a slice of Terror strength

31.name: Heightened Senses
31.description: Terror sense highlights Innocents every 4 seconds instead of 5

32.name: Fun Sponge
32.description: You gain half a slice of Terror strength from each objective you deactivate

33.name: Hoarder
33.description: Consumable items on the floor are highlighted from further away

34.name: Escape Artist
34.description: It takes 25% less time for the escape door to open if you’re the one to interact with it

35.name: Skedaddle
35.description: Move 35% faster (decaying over 3 seconds) after downing Terrors

36.name: Borrowed Time
36.description: Each fuse you put in a fuse box reduces the time it will take for the door to open by 2 seconds

37.name: Critical Thinking
37.description: Guns deal 25% extra damage when hitting targets in the head

38.name: Loaded
38.description: Start with a full ammo clip in your pistol

39.name: Eye Spy
39.description: You can see nametags when close to people in the dark

42.name: Good Lighting
42.description: Cameras are 10% more effective against Terrors

43.name: Head Start
43.description: Each time you respawn you’ll have 25% armour

44.name: Blindfire
44.description: Find it harder to see in the dark but deal 5% more damage

45.name: Try Hard
45.description: If you’re the first person to complete an objective you get full health and armour

46.name: Trigger Happy
46.description: Shoot weapons at a faster rate

47.name: Berserker
47.description: When at less than or equal to 50% health you do 10% more damage

48.name: Magnetic Mag
48.description: Bullets have a 20% chance of returning on hitting a target

49.name: Trust Issues
49.description: When you pull a lever it takes 5 seconds before the objective becomes active giving you time to get to it first

50.name: Triggered
50.description: Increased trap trigger and blast radius

51.name: Greedy
51.description: Keep all your items when respawning

52.name: Blasé
52.description: When downed, additional votes cast on you increase your respawn time by 4 seconds instead of 5

53.name: Please Sir
53.description: After completing an objective you will briefly be shown the position of available levers to activate

54.name: Detective
54.description: When looking at a taken blood bag you can see when it was drank by an infected

55.name: Mind Your Step
55.description: Get an outline on traps when stood near them in human form

56.name: Surprise
56.description: Gain a burst of movement speed when coming out of a vent

57.name: Weak Point
57.description: There is a 10% chance when damaging a lever that it becomes instantly deactivated

58.name: Knowledge Is Power
58.description: Gain half a slice of Terror strength when you pick up a diary entry

59.name: Life Leech
59.description: Get full Terror health when you execute someone

60.name: Quiet Quencher
60.description: Make less noise when you’re drinking from blood bags

61.name: Slowly Does It
61.description: Traps require you to be closer to them before they’re triggered

62.name: Juggernaut
62.description: In Terror form take 10% less damage but move 10% slower

63.name: Uncontrollable
63.description: Transforming into Terror form takes less time

64.name: Step Up
64.description: Other player's footsteps are louder to you in Terror form

65.name: Acquired Taste
65.description: After drinking a blood bag you will briefly be shown other available blood bags

66.name: Vengeance
66.description: After respawning in Terror form you can see the player that downed you for 5 seconds

67.name: Appetiser
67.description: Start the game with half a slice of Terror strength

68.name: Fully Alert
68.description: At full blood when the lights are on you can see the Innocents

69.name: Locked On
69.description: Your Terror sense highlights players with fuses that aren’t running

70.name: Rage Refund
70.description: Get a slice of Terror strength if someone you executed gets antidoted

71.name: Last Laugh
71.description: When enraged and in Terror form you can see all Innocents

72.name: Impatient
72.description: Respawn faster when downed in Terror form

73.name: Solar Powered
73.description: Torches slowly recharge when the lights are on

74.name: Speedy Recovery
74.description: Health packs also instantly heal for 25 upon pickup

75.name: Spotting
75.description: Trackers can now be placed on blood bags, showing an outline of the blood bag's state. This tracker displays only to you and is destroyed upon taking damage.

76.name: Redistribution
76.description: You're able to pick your traps back up again

77.name: Revitalised
77.description: Gain half a blood bag worth of blood when revived by an Innocent player.
